result.markdown:
---
title: "Risk1 probability plots"
author: "John Curtin"
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: console
---


## Overview

This script makes faceted histograms that display the probabilities of lapse separately for true lapse and no lapse observations.  

The data are from the EMA study based on RISK1 project

## Set up environment

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
# handle conflicts
options(conflicts.policy = "depends.ok")

library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr .hidden}

```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.2     ✔ readr     2.1.4
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.0
✔ ggplot2   3.4.2     ✔ tibble    3.2.1
✔ lubridate 1.9.2     ✔ tidyr     1.3.0
✔ purrr     1.0.1     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
theme_set(theme_classic()) 

# Paths
devtools::source_url("https://github.com/jjcurtin/lab_support/blob/main/format_path.R?raw=true")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr .hidden}

```
ℹ SHA-1 hash of file is "a58e57da996d1b70bb9a5b58241325d6fd78890f"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
path_models <- format_path("studydata/risk/models/ema")
path_data_shared <- format_path("studydata/risk/data_processed/shared")
path_data_ema <- format_path("studydata/risk/data_processed/ema")
```
:::


## Open preds dfs


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
preds_week<- readRDS(file.path(path_models, 
                               "outer_preds_1week_0_v5_nested_main.rds"))
preds_day<- readRDS(file.path(path_models, 
                              "outer_preds_1day_0_v5_nested_main.rds"))
preds_hour<- readRDS(file.path(path_models, 
                               "outer_preds_1hour_0_v5_nested_main.rds")) 
```
:::



## Function for faceted probability plot


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
plot_probs <- function(df_preds, model) {
  bar_color <- 
    case_when(
      tolower(model) == "week" ~ "orange",
      tolower(model) == "day" ~ "green",
      tolower(model) == "hour" ~ "blue",
    )
  df_preds |> 
    ggplot(data = _, aes(x = prob_beta)) + 
     geom_histogram(bins = 15, fill = bar_color, col = "black", alpha = .4) +
     facet_wrap(~label, nrow = 2, scales = "free_y") +
     xlab("Pr(Lapse)") +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma)
}
```
:::

  
  
  
# Plots

One week window with no vertical line for decision threshold

::: {#cell-fig-week-no_dec_thres .cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: fig-week-no_dec_thres
#| fig-height: 6
#| fig-width: 6

fig_week <- preds_week |> 
  plot_probs("week")

fig_week
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ema_figs_probability_files/figure-html/fig-week-no_dec_thres-1.png){#fig-week-no_dec_thres width=576}
:::
:::


One week window with vertical line for default decision threshold

::: {#cell-fig-week .cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: fig-week
#| fig-height: 6
#| fig-width: 6

fig_week +
  geom_vline(xintercept = .5, color = "red", size = 2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr .hidden}

```
Warning: Using `size` aesthetic for lines was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0.
ℹ Please use `linewidth` instead.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ema_figs_probability_files/figure-html/fig-week-1.png){#fig-week width=576}
:::
:::


One day window with vertical line for default decision threshold

::: {#cell-fig-day .cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: fig-day
#| fig-height: 6
#| fig-width: 6

fig_day <- preds_day |> 
 plot_probs("day")
 
fig_day +
   geom_vline(xintercept = .5, color = "red", linewidth = 2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ema_figs_probability_files/figure-html/fig-day-1.png){#fig-day width=576}
:::
:::


One day window with vertical line for high (p = 0.9) decision threshold

::: {#cell-fig-day-high_dec_thres .cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: fig-day-high_dec_thres
#| fig-height: 6
#| fig-width: 6

fig_day +
  geom_vline(xintercept = .9, color = "red", linewidth = 2)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ema_figs_probability_files/figure-html/fig-day-high_dec_thres-1.png){#fig-day-high_dec_thres width=576}
:::
:::
